import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={value:localStorage.getItem("loginFeature")?true:false};export var loginSlice=createSlice({name:"loginFeature",initialState:initialState,reducers:{login:function login(state){state.value=true;},logout:function logout(state){state.value=false;}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
var _loginSlice$actions=loginSlice.actions,login=_loginSlice$actions.login,logout=_loginSlice$actions.logout;export{login,logout};export default loginSlice.reducer;
